author: blair
msg: Update the test suite for new svn subcommand list (ls).
In svn_cl__cmd_desc_t, put the new "list" command before "log" so
that svn help will print the commands sorted alphabetically.

author: sussman
msg: Continue issue #685: implement RA->get_dir() in ra_dav.
Now 'svn ls http://' works.  But for the love of ____!, will someone
standard DAV: property that mod_dav_svn is now returning.
ELEM_get_content_length, and allow it pass through validation.
This is an empty revision for padding.

author: sussman
msg: Start of issue #685: implement RA->get_dir(), a matching companion to
RA->get_file().  This function is needed so that 'svn diff -rX:Y' can
compare props on directories.  So far, it's only implemented in
ra_local;  I'll do ra_dav next, and then fix 'svn diff'.
As a proof of concept, though:  add an 'svn ls -rN URL' subcommand.
I know that utilities like Cadaver and Nautilus are more
general-purpose DAV browsers, but they're unable to list older
* svn_ra.h (get_dir):  new RA vtable function declaration.
* svn_client.h, ls.c (svn_client_ls):  new file and function.
* cl.h, ls-cmd.c (svn_cl__ls, print_dirents): new file and functions.
I know that the output of 'print_dirents' is horrible.  I'll leave
to someone else to fix (fixed-width fields, shorter dates, etc.).
